content.text:
{
  "items": [
    {
      "text": "Someone please build a simple tool that monitors my SaaS's status page uptime AND sends me a Slack alert when competitors go down. I'd pay $29/mo for that.",
      "url": "https://x.com/indiehacker1/status/9876543210",
      "author_handle": "indiehacker1",
      "date": "2026-01-19",
      "signal_type": "wish",
      "idea_summary": "Competitor uptime monitoring tool that watches status pages and alerts when competitors experience outages.",
      "target_audience": "SaaS founders who want to capitalize on competitor downtime",
      "engagement": {
        "likes": 482,
        "reposts": 87,
        "replies": 34,
        "quotes": 12
      },
      "why_relevant": "Strong wish signal with specific price point willingness",
      "relevance": 0.93
    },
    {
      "text": "Thread: I built a micro-SaaS that auto-generates changelog entries from Git commits. $2K MRR in 3 months. Here's what I learned...",
      "url": "https://x.com/buildinpublic/status/9876543211",
      "author_handle": "buildinpublic",
      "date": "2026-01-14",
      "signal_type": "building",
      "idea_summary": "Automated changelog generation from Git commits for SaaS products.",
      "target_audience": "Dev teams and SaaS companies that need public changelogs",
      "engagement": {
        "likes": 1203,
        "reposts": 245,
        "replies": 89,
        "quotes": 56
      },
      "why_relevant": "Validated micro-SaaS with revenue proof",
      "relevance": 0.91
    },
    {
      "text": "The biggest gap in the no-code space: there's no good way to build approval workflows. Every tool stops at forms.",
      "url": "https://x.com/nocodefounder/status/9876543212",
      "author_handle": "nocodefounder",
      "date": "2026-01-08",
      "signal_type": "feature_gap",
      "idea_summary": "No-code approval workflow builder that goes beyond simple forms to handle multi-step approval chains.",
      "target_audience": "Non-technical ops teams in companies with 20-200 employees",
      "engagement": {
        "likes": 328,
        "reposts": 67,
        "replies": 45,
        "quotes": 8
      },
      "why_relevant": "Feature gap in a large and growing market",
      "relevance": 0.86
    },
    {
      "text": "Every week I manually export data from 3 different tools, combine in Google Sheets, then send to stakeholders. There must be a better way.",
      "url": "https://x.com/saasops/status/9876543213",
      "author_handle": "saasops",
      "date": "2026-01-25",
      "signal_type": "workflow",
      "idea_summary": "Cross-tool data aggregation and automated reporting service for ops teams.",
      "target_audience": "Operations managers at startups juggling multiple SaaS tools",
      "engagement": {
        "likes": 156,
        "reposts": 23,
        "replies": 18,
        "quotes": 4
      },
      "why_relevant": "Manual workflow with clear automation opportunity",
      "relevance": 0.79
    }
  ]
}
